Package nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon

package nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon
MiniDungen is a Nethack-like game. For a demo of the game: run the main of DungeonApp. The implementation of iv4xr-lib to interface this game to iv4xr-agent can be found in the package nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon.testAgent.
